product.title: Instyler Freestyle Ionic Ceramic Styler, Hair Curling Brush, Hair Straightening Brush
product.description: Instyler FREESTYLE delivers full styling freedom to create smooth, sculpted or textured looks. The innovative 3D Ceramic Heat delivers multi-dimensional styling power by combining ceramic heated bristles with a ceramic heated barrel. Effortlessly brush through hair to smooth strands, while eliminating frizz and adding shine. Twist the Instyler FREESTYLE to create curls and waves or enhance volume at roots with a simple lift.
product.description_html: Instyler FREESTYLE delivers full styling freedom to create smooth, sculpted or textured looks. The innovative 3D Ceramic Heat delivers multi-dimensional styling power by combining ceramic heated bristles with a ceramic heated barrel. Effortlessly brush through hair to smooth strands, while eliminating frizz and adding shine. Twist the Instyler FREESTYLE to create curls and waves or enhance volume at roots with a simple lift.
product.description_full:
Instyler FREESTYLE delivers full styling freedom to create smooth, sculpted or textured looks. The innovative 3D Ceramic Heat delivers multi-dimensional styling power by combining ceramic heated bristles with a ceramic heated barrel. Effortlessly brush through hair to smooth strands, while eliminating frizz and adding shine. Twist the Instyler FREESTYLE to create curls and waves or enhance volume at roots with a simple lift. Instyler FREESTYLE Ionic Ceramic Styler Product Features: 
 * Ceramic Heated Barrel
 * Tourmaline Ceramic Heated Bristles
 * Cool Tip Ionic Bristles
 * 4 Heat Settings up to 400°F
 * 7ft Professional Swivel Cord
 * Automatic Shut Off
product.description_full_html:
Instyler FREESTYLE delivers full styling freedom to create smooth, sculpted or textured looks. The innovative 3D Ceramic Heat delivers multi-dimensional styling power by combining ceramic heated bristles with a ceramic heated barrel. Effortlessly brush through hair to smooth strands, while eliminating frizz and adding shine. Twist the Instyler FREESTYLE to create curls and waves or enhance volume at roots with a simple lift.
Instyler FREESTYLE Ionic Ceramic Styler Product Features:
  • Ceramic Heated Barrel  
  • Tourmaline Ceramic Heated Bristles 
  • Cool Tip Ionic Bristles  
  • 4 Heat Settings up to 400°F  
  • 7ft Professional Swivel Cord  
  • Automatic Shut Off

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
